about_the_game:
Jump into the controversial history of Ravenwest, the most infamous team in the GRID World Series. In the third GRID Legends premium content pack — Rise of Ravenwest — follow the events that propelled the team to stardom and set them onto a path of 5 consecutive GRID World Series championships.

Relive the glory days of Ryan and Nathan McKane as they embark on an epic journey, starting with Ravenwest’s inception, moving on to Nathan’s first GRID World Series title, and beyond. With 11 story events, 4 vehicles, and 3 new career events, can you fight off the competition and ensure Ravenwest’s success, no matter the cost?

Those with the Deluxe Edition of GRID Legends get instant access to Rise of Ravenwest. Deluxe Edition players can invite friends to play the pack’s content for free**. Additionally, Rise of Ravenwest can be purchased separately.

Here’s everything that’s included:
  • 4 new Vehicles
  • 4 new layout variants at Miami
  • 11 new, themed Story Experiences
  • 3 new Career Events
  • 2 existing routes with added Ramps & 1 existing route with added boost gates
  • Plus new Liveries, Icons, and Banners
detailed_description:
Jump into the controversial history of Ravenwest, the most infamous team in the GRID World Series. In the third GRID Legends premium content pack — Rise of Ravenwest — follow the events that propelled the team to stardom and set them onto a path of 5 consecutive GRID World Series championships.

Relive the glory days of Ryan and Nathan McKane as they embark on an epic journey, starting with Ravenwest’s inception, moving on to Nathan’s first GRID World Series title, and beyond. With 11 story events, 4 vehicles, and 3 new career events, can you fight off the competition and ensure Ravenwest’s success, no matter the cost?

Those with the Deluxe Edition of GRID Legends get instant access to Rise of Ravenwest. Deluxe Edition players can invite friends to play the pack’s content for free**. Additionally, Rise of Ravenwest can be purchased separately.

Here’s everything that’s included:
  • 4 new Vehicles
  • 4 new layout variants at Miami
  • 11 new, themed Story Experiences
  • 3 new Career Events
  • 2 existing routes with added Ramps & 1 existing route with added boost gates
  • Plus new Liveries, Icons, and Banners
legal_notice:
*Requires GRID Legends (sold separately) and applicable platform account. One user must own the DLC. Both players must be online simultaneously to play.
**Access available to friend(s) during session that Deluxe Edition owner plays.
name: GRID Legends: Rise of Ravenwest

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: GRID Legends: Rise of Ravenwest - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy GRID Legends: Rise of Ravenwest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130, AMD FX4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950, AMD RADEON RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 8600k, AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080, AMD RX590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

short_description: Race into the history of Ravenwest and discover how they rose to racing infamy.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
